sentences.sContent: Other common forms of synecdoche include two concentric circles or triangles (used as eyes in horse and bison paintings), ibex horns and the hump of a mammoth.
sentences.sContent_eng: Other common forms of synecdoche include two concentric circles or triangles (used as eyes in horse and bison paintings), ibex horns and the hump of a mammoth.
sentences.sCn: 其他普通的提喻形式包括两个同心圆或者三角形（在壁画上马和犀牛的眼睛里也有使用），野生山羊的羊角和长毛象弓起的背部。

trans.tranOther: a wild goat that lives in the mountains of Europe, Asia, and North Africa
